seabirddietDB 0.0.0.9000
  • Reference

Filter Seabird Diet database

Source: R/query.R
sbd_filter.Rd

Filter Seabird Diet database

sbd_filter(db = seabirddiet, pred_species = NULL, prey_taxon = NULL,
  year = NULL, metrics = c("freq_occ", "freq_biomass", "freq_num"))

Arguments

db

Seabird Diet database to filter. Defaults to `seabirddiet`
pred_species

character vector. Predator species to include
prey_taxon

character vector. Prey taxa to include
year

integer vector. Year(s) to include
metrics

which dietary metrics to include. Defaults to frequency of occurence (`freq_occ`)

Value

a filtered tibble of the supplied database

Examples

sbd_filter(year = 2012)
#> Warning: Unknown columns: `geometry`
#> Error in select(db, dplyr::one_of(metrics)): could not find function "select"
sbd_filter(pred_species = "Alca torda", year = 2012)
#> Warning: Unknown columns: `geometry`
#> Error in select(db, dplyr::one_of(metrics)): could not find function "select"
